name: Emergent Horror - Co-op Multiplayer
description:
This game pits up to 4 players cooperatively against an AI monster aboard an abandoned space station. Use various emergent gameplay systems in order to evade the monster while you search for a creative way to defeat it. 

This game was made in a week by a bunch of friends just trying to have some fun:

Ben Riley (Level Design / Systems), Thomas Pring (AI), Tyler Yungmann (Systems / UI), Nabil Sekirime (Networking / Systems), Tomas Rodriguez (Environment Art / Layout), Hiram Rodriguez (Lighting), Carlos Torres (Shaders), Joseph Medina (Prop Modeling), Kelsey Watkins (Documentation), Sam McCollum (Concept Art).

Hey thanks for stopping by. We aimed really high with this one and definitely didn't finish everything we wanted to but we did have a ton of fun and think that shows when you play. Have fun!
